net.jawr.web.resource.handler.bundle

Interface ResourceBundleHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceBundleHandler, ServletContextResourceBundleHandler

    public interface ResourceBundleHandler
    This interface is implemented by the object which handle resource bundle.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getBundleTextDirPath()
      Returns the path of the directory containing the generated text bundles
      Properties getJawrBundleMapping()
      Returns the jawr bundle mapping from the working directory.
      InputStream getResourceBundleAsStream(String bundleName)
      Retrieves the input stream of a resource bundle.
      ReadableByteChannel getResourceBundleChannel(String bundleName)
      Retrieves ReadableByteChannel on a resource bundle.
      Reader getResourceBundleReader(String bundleName)
      Retrieves a reader for a bundle from the store.
      String getResourceType()
      Returns the resource type managed by the resource handler
      boolean isExistingMappingFile()
      Checks if the mapping file exists in the working directory
      void storeBundle(String bundleName, JoinableResourceBundleContent bundleResourcesContent)
      Stores a collected group of resources with the specified name.
      void storeJawrBundleMapping(Properties bundleMapping)
      Store the bundle mapping.

      • storeBundle

        void storeBundle(String bundleName,
               JoinableResourceBundleContent bundleResourcesContent)
        Stores a collected group of resources with the specified name. Creates a text version, a gzipped binary version.
        Parameters:
        bundleName - the bundle name.
        bundleResources - the bundle resources

                                             throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Retrieves ReadableByteChannel on a resource bundle.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        ResourceNotFoundException
